item.title: Tiger add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Man is the only creature who refuses to be what he is." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Tiger add a quote by David Byrne
item.description: "Sometimes it's a form of love just to talk to somebody that you have nothing in common with and still be fascinated by their presence." -- David Byrne

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If I were not a physicist, I would probably be a musician. I often think in music. I live my daydreams in music. I see my life in terms of music." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "We write to taste life twice, in the moment and in retrospect." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Tiger add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Tiger add a quote by James A. Baldwin
item.description: "Love does not begin and end the way we seem to think it does. Love is a battle, love is a war; love is a growing up." -- James A. Baldwin

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Education is an admirable thing, but it is well to remember from time to time that nothing that is worth knowing can be taught." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "If you're going to be crazy, you have to get paid for it or else you're going to be locked up." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Socrates
item.description: "Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle." -- Socrates

item.title: Tiger add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "The way to love anything is to realize that it may be lost." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "A wise girl kisses but doesn't love, listens but doesn't believe, and leaves before she is left." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I restore myself when I'm alone." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I've often stood silent at a party for hours listening to my movie idols turn into dull and little people. " -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Irwin Shaw
item.description: "There are too many books I haven’t read, too many places I haven’t seen, too many memories I haven’t kept long enough." -- Irwin Shaw
